itemDescription: British aristocrat and wife of Charles Grey, 2nd Earl Grey

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Elizabeth Grey, Countess Grey (née Ponsonby; 4 March 1776 – 26 November 1861) was a British aristocrat and Countess Grey as wife of Charles Grey, 2nd Earl Grey, the prime minister of the United Kingdom.

response: | 2 || Charles Grey, 2nd Earl Grey(1764–1845) || 1807–1845 || Mary Grey, Countess Grey ||Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1830 to 1834 ||rowspan="7"|  Viscount HowickBaron GreyBaronet
